name: Shivanshi
greetingText: I wanted to create something special in an engineer's style, so here it is hope you'll like it !
wishText: All the best for your exams and an unforgettable year ahead. I am sure they will be good ! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy returns of the day blah blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Wishing you a great day today!
